name: @jho406/breezy
description: Develop ReactJS apps the Rails Way

scripts.test: npm run browserify:test && npm run browserify:src && npm run blade
scripts.browserify:test: mkdir -p tmp/browserify/ && browserify test/javascript/src/test.coffee -o tmp/browserify/test.js -t coffeeify --extension='.coffee'
scripts.browserify:src: mkdir -p lib/assets/javascript/ && browserify src/index.coffee -o lib/assets/javascript/breezy.js -t coffeeify --extension='.coffee'
scripts.qunit:node: rm -rf tmp/test && npm run decaf:src && npm run decaf:test && cp -a tmp/decaf/breezy tmp/src && ./node_modules/qunit/bin/cli.js  -c tmp/src/index.js -t tmp/test/javascript/src/test.js

author: jho406
